en.name: Ehab Shalaby
en.about: I'm Ehab Ali Shalaby, an IT and network enthusiast with a strong interest in digital networking, IT infrastructure, and cybersecurity. I hold a Bachelor's degree in Business Information Systems. I studied professional courses such as A+, Network+, Security+, CCNA, and have hands-on projects in routing, switching, Linux, Windows, and Cisco environments.
skills: Networking Fundamentals: IP addressing, subnetting, routing, switching, VLANs, NAT, DHCP, DNS
Certifications Studied: CompTIA A+, Network+, Security+, Cisco CCNA
Network Tools: Cisco Packet Tracer, GNS3
Troubleshooting & Configuration: Network setup, fault isolation, performance tuning
Cybersecurity Basics: Network security principles, access control, firewalls, threat awareness
Technical Skills: Windows OS, basic Linux commands, hardware setup and diagnostics
Soft Skills: Problem-solving, attention to detail, teamwork, self-learning, time management
courses: CompTIA Network+ (Network fundamentals, protocols, devices, and security)
CompTIA Security+ (Basic security concepts, threats, and mitigation)
Cisco CCNA (Routing, switching, IP addressing, VLANs, OSPF)

projects.title: Network Design with Two Switches and VLAN Implementation
projects.description: Network designed using two switches connected via a trunk link. End devices assigned to VLANs to improve performance and security.
projects.skills: VLAN Configuration, Access and Trunk Port Setup, Switch-to-Switch Trunking, Network Segmentation

projects.title: Network Design Using Three Routers with Static Routing
projects.description: Network topology with three routers connected via serial interfaces. Static routing configured for inter-network communication.
projects.skills: Static Routing Configuration, Serial Interface Setup, Subnetting, WAN Design Concepts

projects.title: VLAN Implementation with Inter-VLAN Routing
projects.description: Comprehensive VLAN setup using router-on-a-stick for inter-VLAN routing.
projects.skills: VLAN and Inter-VLAN Routing, Access and Trunk Port Configuration, Router-on-a-Stick Implementation

projects.title: Network Design with Three Routers and Subnet Segmentation
projects.description: Three routers network divided into three subnets for different departments. Efficient IP management and scalability.
projects.skills: IP Subnetting, Router Configuration, Switch Setup, Inter-router Communication, Network Segmentation
